title: Why is Eminem considered to be against the Illuminati? - Quora

response.answer_text: He is not. That’s a lie. He is surrounded by Satanists. Just look at his videos since he has been around Dre.     Alright, I’m done.

It’s generally understood Eminem is a board member of the Reptilians, who float theories and counter-theories about the Illuminati and whether it even exists, in order to distract attention from their own existence and plans.
